Name: 鬼魂街
About the game: I. game play This is a third person shooting game. The player will play a female character with an automatic rifle and unlimited bullets. Players were born in a street full of female Ghosts - Ghost street! Only by killing the female ghost and escaping can we win. The game consists of two levels, namely, ghost Street day and night. The game is full of scary sound effects. II. Basic operations 1. right click to aim and left click to shoot. 2. WASD key walking / running. III. exquisite fashion The game contains 8 sets of fashion, one click switching! IV. terrorist scenes
